ARPU.description: Average Revenue Per User over the period

activeUsersTrend.description: Data-points representing the number of active users day by day, throughout the period

bestSellers.description: The products that sold the most in this period, sorted in descending order of `itemsPurchased`

clicks.description: Total Clicks on Google search results over the period

clicksAndImpressionsTrend.description: How total clicks and impressions on Google search results varied over the period

eCommercePurchases.description: How many e-commerce purchases were made in the period

engagementTime.description: How long each user spent on the page in milliseconds, on average.

impressions.description: The number of times the website was served as a Google search result

newUserPercent.description: The percentage of active users who were new to the site.

newUsers.description: The number of active users who did not appear in previous periods.

pageViewsPerUser.description: How many pages each user viewed on average.

period.description: The period over which these analytics represent.

refundAmount.description: The amount of money refunded to customers over this period

totalRevenue.description: Total revenue over the period, including delivery

TimeEntry.description: A TimeEntry for a Clockify User

billable.description: Indicates whether a time entry is billable.

amount.description: Represents an amount as an integer.

customFieldValues.description: Represents a list of custom field value objects.

items.description: Represents a custom field value object

customFieldID.description: Represents custom field identifier across the system.

timeEntryID.description: Represents time entry identifier across the system.

type.description: Represents a custom field value source type.

amount.description: Represents an amount as an integer.

id.description: Represents time entry identifier across the system.

isLocked.description: Represents whether time entry is locked for modification.

kioskID.description: Represents kiosk identifier across the system.

projectID.description: Represents project identifier across the system.

tagIds.description: Represents a list of tag identifiers across the system.

taskID.description: Represents task identifier across the system.

end.description: Represents an end date in yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format.

start.description: Represents a start date in yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format.

type.description: Represents a time entry type enum.

userID.description: Represents user identifier across the system.

ShippingOptionGroups.description: Required shape of environment variable for VITE_SHIPPING_OPTION_GROUPS.

sku.description: SKU of the product on Supabase.

AssociationMetadata.description: Additional information on the association between an image and its product.

global.description: Whether this image is relevant to all products in the product group (if it exists), rather than just the SKU it's assigned to

group_product_icon.description: Whether this image is to be used as an icon for the product when  in a group, rather than as a standard product image

group_representative.description: Whether this image is used to represent the group as a whole, rather than an individual variant.

association_metadata.description: Additional information on the association between the image and its product.

bucket_id.description: The identifier of the bucket that the image object belongs to

display_order.description: The order to display this image in when in a list, higher numbers come later

id.description: The identifier of the image object

image_url.description: DEPRECATED: Use `id` instead. The direct access url of the image

inserted_at.description: ISO timestamp of when the association was made between the image and the product

metadata.description: Additional information on the image object itself

path_tokens.description: String tokens representing the path through the bucket to obtain the image

product_sku.description: The SKU of the product this image is related to

category.description: The category the product belongs to

description.description: The customer facing description of the product

extended_customs_description.description: An extended description for customs forms applicable to higher value orders.

group_name.description: Products with the same group name are displayed as one product with variants, instead of each as unique products.

inserted_at.description: Time at which the product was added to the database as an ISO date string

last_edited.description: The time which this data was last edited as an ISO date string.

last_edited_by.description: The last person to edit this product

seo_priority.description: The priority of this product to search engines, used in sitemaps

variant_name.description: The name of this specific variant, if `group_name != undefined`

name.description: Customer facing name of the product

origin_country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code of the country which this product had its final manufacturing stage in. e.g. "CHN" for "China"

package_type_override.description: For products which are too large to fit in smaller boxes, so require a specific minimum box size to send.

price.description: Price of product in GBP inc. Tax

tags.description: The tags attached to the product

weight.description: Weight of the product in grams.
